property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple Breaker Supernova - When this creature enters the battle zone, tap all enemy creatures. They don't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Mindwipe - Each time one of your Corrupted creatures would be banished, return it to your hand instead. Tainted Seas - You tap 2 fewer mana cards to summon Corrupted creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Dark Gambit - When this creature enters the battle zone, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your discard pile. Then choose a card in your discard pile at random. If that card is a non-evolution creature, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple Breaker Brutal Offensive - All your other Armored Dragons have "Powerful Attack +5000" and break an additional shield. Intimidating Presence - All your opponent's Dragons can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple Breaker Pulverize - When this creature enters the battle zone, it battles target enemy creature. Primordial Roar - Whenever this creature attacks and whenever it becomes the target of one of your opponent's spells or abilities, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put a Nature creature from among them into the battle zone. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Nature Monarch - Each of your other Nature creatures gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Scrying Germs - Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a spell from it and your opponent discards that spell. Spell Twist - Whenever one of your creatures become the target of one of your opponents spells, you may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Blocker Fast Attack Into the Fray - Whenever this creature wins a battle for the first time each turn, untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped) Evolution - Put on one of your Skyforce Champions or Colossi. Double Breaker Spell Sanctum - Each time a spell that is level 7 or less would enter your mana zone from your deck, you may cast it for free instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Evolution - Put on one of your Corrupted creatures or Armored Dragons. Corrupted Commander - All of your Corrupted creatures have "Powerful Attack +5000" and "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This card enters your mana zone tapped.) Protector Double Breaker Fierce Friend - Whenever one of your creatures that has "Scaradorable" or "Glu-urrgle" in its name is attacked, untap this creature, and this creature gets +5000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one of your creatures. At the end of this turn, untap that creature. It gets "Blocker Blocker" until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Your opponent chooses one of his or her untapped creatures in the battle zone. Tap that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Skirmisher G-Force - Whenever this creature blocks, tap target enemy creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Oathbound - Each time this creature or one of your other non-evolution Skyforce Champions would be banished, put it into your shield zone face down as a new shield instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Until the start of your next turn, creatures can't attack you. (They can still attack your creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Your opponent chooses on of his or her untapped creatures in the battle zone. Return that creature to your opponent's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Guard Psionic Rebuke - When this creature enters the battle zone, you may return target creature from the battle zone to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Guard Reef Salvage - When this creature enters the battle zone and whenever it blocks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Put target creature on the bottom of its owners deck. That player reveals cards from the top of his or her deck until a non-evolution creature of the same level or less is revealed. That player puts the revealed creature into the battle zone, then shuffles the remaining revealed cards and put them on the bottom of his or her deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Second-in-Command - Whenever one of your Corrupted creatures attacks, you may draw a card. Cloaking Field - Each of your Corrupted creatures can't be the target of your opponent's spells that are level 4 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Put a non-evolution creature that is level 8 or less from your hand into the battle zone. Then return that creature from the battle zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker Guard Dinner - When this creature wins a battle, banish it. Dessert - When this creature is banished, your opponent chooses one of his or her creatures in the battle zone. Banish that creature.

property.value: Blocker Decay - When this creature attacks, banish it at the end of the attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Blast Target enemy creature gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is banished.)

property.value: Dark Lord's Verdict - Whenever your opponent draws a card other than the first card of his or her turn, choose one of your opponent's shields. This creature breaks that shield.

property.name: Rules

property.value: Blocker Guard Shambling - This creature enters the battle zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If your opponent has 6 or more shields, choose 3 of them. Your opponent puts those shields into his or her discard pile.
